channel.title: Npc Position Resetting
channel.description: Looking for some direction or guideline to whatever makes the npcs that are already spawned reset position slowly when the server starts but then rapidly resets in a few minutes... already looked thru whats related to npcs like client, npchandler, npc, server, bla bla bla and i couldn't find anything. What im looking for specificly is if there is a timer of some sort or something that causes this btw its [b]czar/pimpscape[/b] base no shit wL :|
